J

Jest - Class in JEST.cards
This class defines the list of cards that the player detains during all the game.
Jest() - Constructor for class JEST.cards.Jest
At the beginning of the game, the player's jest is empty.
JEST - package JEST
This package contains the general classes of JEST: Game: this is the most important class of the game.
JEST.cards - package JEST.cards
This package contains all the classes linked to the cards in the game : A Card is a SuitCard or a JokerCard.
JEST.cards.trophy - package JEST.cards.trophy
This package contains all the trophies of the game : We have the interface Trophy which is implemented by the 6 classes for each trophy.
JEST.virtualPlayer - package JEST.virtualPlayer
This package contains the three strategies possible for VirtualPlayer : We have the AgressiveStrategy, the DefensiveStrategy and the RandomStrategy.
JOKER - Enum constant in enum class JEST.cards.Suit
 
JokerCard - Class in JEST.cards
There is one joker among the cards.
JokerCard(Trophy) - Constructor for class JEST.cards.JokerCard
The JokerCard is associated to a Trophy.
JokerTrophy - Class in JEST.cards.trophy
The winner is the player with the Joker.
JokerTrophy() - Constructor for class JEST.cards.trophy.JokerTrophy
